mods.note: Title varies: 1905-1905, Mercure musicale; 1907, Mercure musicale et bulletin française de SIM; 1908-Oct. 1909, Society's Bulletin française; Nov.-Dec. 1909, Revue musicale SIM.
Société Internationale de Musique./-S I M; revue musicale.
Directors: 1905-1909, L. Laloy (with J. Marnold, 1905-06, J. Écorcheville, 1907-09)--1910?- J. Écorcheville.
Separately paged supplements accompany some issues.
